How It Works

From signal to decision to delivery in three clear steps.

1

Input

Ingest events, files, and API payloads from your existing tools.

2

Process

Apply rules and model-driven logic to classify, route, and decide.

3

Result

Ship outcomes to dashboards, alerts, and downstream actions.

Decision Velocity

From raw signal to clear action in seconds

  • Policy-aware automation templates
  • Human override points for edge cases

Frequently Asked Questions

Core product, rollout, and pricing questions for launch-stage visitors.

Can NOVA be used by both individuals and enterprise teams?

Yes. The structure supports solo workflows for B2C and controlled deployment models for B2B, including role-based governance placeholders.

How long does initial setup usually take?

A basic setup can be completed in under 30 minutes with starter templates. Team rollouts typically include an additional onboarding checklist.

Does it integrate with existing tools?

Placeholder integrations include API, webhooks, and common workspace apps. Custom connectors can be staged as part of an enterprise rollout.

What about security and compliance?

Security and compliance claims are placeholder-only in v1. You can present planned controls such as RBAC, audit logs, and data policy options.

Is there a free plan?

Yes. The pricing structure includes a starter-level individual plan with placeholder limits and a clear upgrade path.

Can this scale across departments?

The IA and section model are built to scale from single users to large teams with staged rollout, procurement, and support placeholders.

Ready to ship your first flow?

Start with placeholders now, layer real data and proof points in your next release.
